00040 template<class Precision = DefaultPrecision>
00041 class LinearSpringDamper {
00042     public:
00043         typedef DimensionedQuantities::Quantity<DimensionedQuantities::dims::mass, Precision> mass_t;
00044         typedef DimensionedQuantities::Quantity<DimensionedQuantities::dims::length, Precision> length_t;
00045         typedef DimensionedQuantities::Quantity<DimensionedQuantities::dims::stiffness, Precision> stiffness_t;
00046         typedef DimensionedQuantities::Quantity<DimensionedQuantities::dims::viscosity, Precision> viscosity_t;
00047         typedef DimensionedQuantities::Quantity<DimensionedQuantities::dims::force, Precision> force_t;
00048 
00049         LinearSpringDamper(const mass_t & mass, const stiffness_t & stiffness, const viscosity_t & viscosity = 0) :
00050                 _m(mass),
00051                 _K(stiffness),
00052                 _B(viscosity),
00053                 _xValid(false),
00054                 _x(std::numeric_limits<Precision>::max()),
00055                 _fValid(false),
00056                 _f(std::numeric_limits<Precision>::max()) {}
00057 
00058         void setDisplacement(const length_t & displacement);
00059 
00060         const force_t & force();
00061 
00062 
00063     protected:
00066         mass_t _m;
00067         stiffness_t _K;
00068         viscosity_t _B;
00070 
00073 
00075         bool _xValid;
00076         length_t _x;
00077 
00079 
00082         bool _fValid;
00083         force_t _f;
00085 
00086 
00087 };
